message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product.
I understand that $1600000 is still a bit below my target, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer it to you for $1700000. This is as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1650000 for the product.
I understand that you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'll make one more compromise. I'll offer it to you for $1680000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1620000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. I'll meet you halfway between my previous offer and your latest offer. I'll offer it to you for $1670000. This is my final and best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product.
